body: This type of story has appeared so much that I'm always wondering if this happens for real in Japan. The moms teaching sons. The lottery where boys go to a woman's house/apartment to "learn " sex. The festival where boys are encouraged to meet "volunteers" to learn sex. There's always something. And yet no one talks about whether its really happening. Oh well.
I think the art is flawed but cute. I still nutted.
the art looks like a combination of izayoi no kiki and junji ito LMAO. still nutted
